alert.note: Alert for Hopkins; Hunt; Rains; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 1:22AM CDT until June 16 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Hunt County in north central Texas... Northwestern Van Zandt County in north central Texas... Southern Hopkins County in north central Texas... Rains County in north central Texas... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 121 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Quinlan, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Greenville, Grand Saline, West Tawakoni, Quinlan, Emory, East Tawakoni, Point, Hawk Cove, Fruitvale, Greenville Club Lake, Lake Tawakoni, Lake Tawakoni State Park, Lake Fork Reservoir, Lone Oak, Alsa, Cash, Flats, Cornersville, Hermits Cove and Dixon. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. This storm has a history of producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
